jobDescription:
About the job
FirmPilot is on the hunt for a world-class full-stack engineer! We are looking for someone who doesn’t just write code but architects scalable, AI-powered solutions from the ground up. If you’re a master of Next.js, React, modern .NET 9, and AWS, this is your chance to build game changing marketing tech in a fast moving, high-performance team.



What You Bring
Staff level expertise in Next.js, React, and .NET 9 - this isn’t an entry-level role.
Deep experience with containerization, AWS infrastructure, and Terraform.
Mastery of domain-driven design and event-driven architectures.
True CI/CD mindset: trunk-based development, automated testing, infra-as-code, feature flags, progressive deployment - we don’t cut corners.
Proven ability to design, build, and ship complex RESTful APIs that scale.
Passion for monitoring, observability, and distributed systems best practices.
Our Tech Stack & Environment
Pixel-perfect Next.js/React frontends
Containerized .NET 9 services built on DDD principles
Advanced AI/ML integration (vector databases, embeddings, generative AI)
Event-driven architecture with event sourcing & CQRS
Zero-trust CI/CD pipeline with fully automated quality gates
No manual infra - we live by Infrastructure as Code
What You’ll Do
Own features end-to-end from UI design to deployment
Ship complex applications without red tape
Solve hard problems with speed and precision
Influence product direction and technical strategy
Build for scale and resilience - no quick fixes, only real engineering
Why FirmPilot?
Direct impact on cutting-edge AI-powered products
Rapid career growth, your success fuels ours
No bureaucracy, no fluff, just elite engineering
Work with brilliant, no-BS teammates who challenge you to be better
Role Not for You If…
You need constant direction or hand-holding
You prefer process over progress
You’re looking for a cushy 9-to-5
You aren’t obsessed with learning & pushing boundaries
